person.persName: Andrew J. Viley (Wealthy Scott County, KY farmer and cattle breeder)

body.p: Residence: Scott County, Kentucky. A wealthy farmer and shorthorn cattle breeder. Born in Paynes Depot, Scott County, Kentucky. Son of Willa Viley and Lydia Smith. Married Mary Louisa Peak Nuckols. Father of Annie, Lydia, Sallie, Leland, and Willa Viley. Died in Paynes Depot, Scott County, Kentucky. Brother of Ann Eliza (Viley) Johnson, who married George Washington Johnson.
